EmailTemplate.subject: ClearChoice Dental Implant Center Patient Seminar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName},
Just a quick reminder about your reservation to attend the FREE patient seminar at ClearChoice Dental Implant Center on {!Lead.Well_Formatted_Date__c} at {!Lead.Well_Formatted_Time__c}.
You can look forward to:
Receiving a complimentary 3D CAT scan Learning how implants can provide a clear solution for your dental needs Obtaining answers for your specific dental questions Meeting the doctors Touring our clinic
We do request a call at 888-654-4675 to verbally confirm that you will be at this seminar. If something has come up and you can't make it, please notify us know within 48 hours since we have limited seating. You may also respond to this email.
Best regards,
{!Lead.OwnerFullName} Dental Implant Consultant ClearChoice Dental Implant Center
